Metadata.homeTitle: Sellio - Sell anything online with just one link
Metadata.homeDescription: Stop replying to chats all day. A digital product platform for Thai creators ‚Äî no chat replies, no website needed. Start selling instantly. Free to start.

Hero.subheadline: Stop spending all day replying to chats and sending files. A digital product platform for Thai creators ‚Äî no chat replies, no website needed. Start selling instantly.

Features.subtitle: All the features you need to sell online like a pro ‚Äî without wasting time on complicated setups.
Features.sellAnythingDesc: Digital files, online courses, E-books, Templates, Presets, and more
Features.bookingDesc: Open booking slots for consulting, 1-on-1 coaching, and live sessions
Features.easyPaymentDesc: Supports PromptPay QR, bank transfer, and auto payment notifications
Features.analyticsDesc: Full dashboard with real-time stats and sales insights
Features.couponsDesc: Create unlimited discount codes with custom conditions
Features.reviewsDesc: Let customers leave reviews to build trust for your products
Features.affiliateDesc: Add affiliate links instantly and earn commissions
Features.secureDeliveryDesc: Payment verified before delivery ‚Äî fraud protection built in
Features.customersDesc: Store customer data, view purchase history, and export to CSV
Features.notificationsDesc: Get notified on new orders with automatic email confirmations
Features.customizeStoreDesc: Choose themes, change colors, add your logo ‚Äî make it your brand
Features.socialShareDesc: Share buttons for Facebook, X, Line with full SEO support

HowItWorks.subtitle: No technical knowledge needed. No coding required. Just follow these simple steps and start selling.
HowItWorks.step1Desc: Takes less than 1 minute. Create an account and get your store link instantly.
HowItWorks.step2Desc: Upload files, set prices, write descriptions. Ready to sell in 5 minutes.
HowItWorks.step3Desc: Share your store link on Bio, Facebook, Instagram, TikTok.
HowItWorks.step4Desc: Customers pay via PromptPay. Money goes directly to your account.

Pricing.subtitle: No hidden fees, no lock-in ‚Äî start selling today.
Pricing.freeDesc: Start selling now, no cost at all
Pricing.proDesc: Sell seriously, full control over your store

Testimonials.subtitle: See what other creators are saying about us
Testimonials.t1Content: I've been selling Presets and Templates on Sellio for almost a year. Super easy to use ‚Äî customers pay via QR instantly. No more manually sending files via chat.
Testimonials.t2Content: The booking system is amazing. Multiple time slots, auto reminders ‚Äî never miss an appointment. My income tripled.
Testimonials.t3Content: One link in my Bio handles everything ‚Äî E-books, courses, and affiliate links. The dashboard is beautiful and shows clear sales data.
Testimonials.t4Content: I've tried many platforms. Sellio is the easiest. Full Thai language support, low fees ‚Äî perfect for Thai creators.
Testimonials.t5Content: Selling Lightroom Presets and Photography Courses is so convenient. Customers pay and get the files instantly ‚Äî no manual sending needed.
Testimonials.t6Content: Selling beats and sample packs is super easy. Multiple pricing tiers with different licenses. Even international customers can buy.

CTA.subheadline: Create your online store today. Takes less than 5 minutes. Start earning from what you love.
CTA.trustText: No credit card required ‚Ä¢ Cancel anytime ‚Ä¢ PromptPay supported

Footer.description: A digital product platform designed for Thai content creators.

Upgrade.upgradeSuccess: Upgrade successful! Welcome to Sellio Pro
Upgrade.upgradeSuccessDesc: You can now use all features
Upgrade.paymentCancelledDesc: You can try upgrading again anytime
Upgrade.cancelAtPeriodEnd: Cancel at end of billing period
Upgrade.switchToYearlyDesc: Pay only ‡∏ø800 (‡∏ø99 credit from your monthly plan)

Upgrade.errorRetry: An error occurred. Please try again.
Upgrade.confirmCancelImmediate:
Are you sure you want to cancel Pro immediately?

Your Pro plan will be cancelled immediately and changed to Free.
Upgrade.confirmCancelEnd:
Are you sure you want to cancel Pro?

You can still use Pro until the end of your current billing period.
Upgrade.faqChangePlanAnswer: Yes, you can upgrade or cancel anytime. If you cancel, you can still use Pro until the expiration date.
Upgrade.faqCancelProducts: Will my products be deleted if I cancel Pro?
Upgrade.faqCancelProductsAnswer: No, all your products will remain. However, if you have more than 2 products, you won't be able to create new ones until you upgrade or delete some.
Upgrade.faqPaymentAnswer: Pay via credit/debit card through Stripe, a world-class secure payment system. Auto-charged monthly.
Upgrade.proNoBrandingDesc: Remove "Powered by Sellio" from your store
Upgrade.proAdvancedAnalyticsDesc: View in-depth statistics to grow your business
